<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[King Vesket](/NPCs.aspx?ID=2272)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 140</row>

**Perception** +12

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Iruxi](/Languages.aspx?ID=32)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +15, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +13, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +15, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +12, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +3

**Con** +3

**Int** +2

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +5
</row>

**Items**
[Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [trident](/Weapons.aspx?ID=45)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 23 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +12 

</row>

**HP** 115

**Righteous Certainty** ([mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) Whenever Vesket becomes [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19), he reduces the condition value by 1. If Vesket ever realizes the spirit of Stisshak is actually a will-o'-wisp, he loses this ability.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, swim 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_trident_ +18 ([thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 2d8+7 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +17,
**Damage** 2d8+7 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +17 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 2d6+7 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_trident_ +18 ([thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 2d8+10 piercing

**Trident Twist** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** Vesket is wielding a trident; **Effect** Vesket attempts to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) a foe. If he critically succeeds, he makes a trident melee Strike against the disarmed foe, using the same multiple attack penalty as the Disarm attempt. The trident Strike does not count toward his multiple attack penalty.

**Triumphant Roar** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** Vesket's last action reduced a foe to 0 Hit Points; **Effect** Vesket attempts an Intimidation check to Demoralize up to four foes within 30 feet. For each success, he gains 4 temporary Hit Points (8 on a critical success) that last for 10 minutes.

</column>
name: King Vesket
